title: npm install fails on Windows 7
body:
- [x] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

Yes. Seems unmanned.
## Issue

Cannot install truffle under Windows 7. The problem seems to be path lengths, which exceed the allowable length in that OS.
## Steps to Reproduce

npm install -g truffle
## Expected Behavior

I expect it to install. :)

Closing ticket.

Hi Rob,

Regarding the Truffle Gitter:

> Yes. Seems unmanned.

There are 420 subscribed Gitter users at the time of this writing. There
are definitely users willing to help. I assume you caught people at the
wrong time.

That said, there is no paid support person, so please continue reaching out
to the community if you don't immediately get a response.

Cheers.
